div.head: LACCEI and Agora Repository
div.p: DSpace (LACCEI-AXCES) is a digital service that collects, preserves, and distributes digital material. Repositories are important tools for preserving an organization's legacy; they facilitate digital preservation and scholarly communication.
You can see a browse and search tutorial in the repository in this link.
Institutional policies can be reviewed at this link
The official LACCEI website is: here
